entry.title: Mass Covid Testing Becomes China's New Normal
entry.content: China is doubling down on mass testing as a key weapon against Covid-19 even as costs mount and the highly infectious Omicron variant exposes challenges with the strategy.

entry.title: Ukraine Launches Counteroffensive to Disrupt Russian Supply Lines
entry.content: Ukrainian forces continued clearing villages north of Kharkiv, Russian President Vladimir Putin warned Finlandâ€™s leader that joining NATO would risk damaging ties with Moscow, and GOP senators visited Kyiv.

entry.title: Rising Food Prices Roil Developing World
entry.content: Soaring prices are triggering shortages and protests as disruption from the Ukraine war adds to existing strains on global supplies of grains, meat and other foodstuffs.
